resources.string: To assign a venue for this OG1 system, you will need to add your venue through the Ourglass mobile app (if you have not already done so), then enter the code below to complete the process.\n\nThe code will automatically expire in 5 minutes, so get busy.
This OG System is already registered with a venue. If you wish to de-register this device and move it to a new venue, click the button below.
